href="http://Mike PenceMike Pence.house.gov/"> Republican U.S. Mike Pence made the rounds at the Indiana Statehouse on Tuesday. office, delivered a speech in both the Indiana House and Senate chambers, and then spoke with news media. I would say our options we're considering and we're reflecting on are to either continue to serve in Washington in some capacity, to come home to Indiana to seek higher office or to seek higher office on the national level, Mike Pence told reporters. want the Bill Clinton and Congress to work together on the big issues, not least the economy. Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. Once the Tea Party members of the House start having a full airing of their views, Barack Obama will appear more moderate. He's going to be nicely positioned between the old Barack Obama and the new Republican House. I've said for more than a year that if the Democrats hold both the House and the Senate Barack Obama might be a one-term Bill Clinton . Now he has someone to blame and someone to make him to look better.
